document_type: Final Determination Notification and Personnel Records
security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document includes a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding HSCA staff payroll records, specifically concerning Denise L. McCray, as well as McCray's employment history, resume, and related correspondence.
summary_one_paragraph: The document consists of a Final Determination Notification related to the postponement of certain information within HSCA staff payroll records, specifically Social Security numbers, due to privacy concerns. It also contains records pertaining to Denise L. McCray's employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, including her resume, letters of resignation and commendation, and payroll authorization forms detailing her salary and dates of employment. The Review Board completed its review on 10/24/95, with the next review scheduled for 2017.
title: Assassination Records Review Board Final Determination Notification and Personnel Records for Denise L. McCray
